0.name: None (suit privilege)
0.description: The second player of the trick must always play a card of the current suit, if possible. Otherwise, they must play a card of the current value. This is the default.

1.name: King's privilege
1.description: When a player plays a King, the other player must follow with another King, if possible. Otherwise, they must play a card of the current suit.

2.name: Figure privilege
2.description: When a player plays a figure (King/Queen), the other player must follow with the same figure (King/Queen), if possible. Otherwise, they must play a card of the current suit.

0.name: Off
0.description: Players must always follow the privilege rule

1.name: On
1.description: Once during each hand, either player X or player Y (whoever uses it first) can ignore the privilege rule.
